They are libraries used to support the reading of FITS image files in FITSImageReader.java. The  word document is the primary documentation file.The files are available at:http://heasarc.gsfc.nasa.gov/docs/heasarc/fits/java/v0.9/v0.97I changed the names opf the jar files on the web site to make them distinctive.fits.jarimage.jar -> fits_image.jarutil.jar -> fits_util.jarThese classes were created by Thomas McGlynn at Goddard Copyright: Thomas McGlynn 1997-1999.  This code may be used for any purpose, non-commercial  or commercial so long as this copyright notice is retained  in the source code or included in or referred to in any  derived software.
